meta.description: Optimize the selection of food items to meet nutritional needs at minimum cost.

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein content per food item in grams

params.name: carbohydrates
params.description: Carbohydrates content per food item in grams

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per food item in dollars

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of servings of each food item

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of selected food items

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(protein[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 74 grams of protein

constraints.name: carbohydrates_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(carbohydrates[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 102 grams of carbohydrates

constraints.name: calories_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(calories[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
